data.quote: You can have everything you want in life if you just help enough people get what they want in life.
data.author: Zig Ziglar

data.quote: If I have the belief that I can do it, I shall surely acquire the capacity to do it even if I may not have it at the beginning.
data.author: Gandhi

data.quote: It takes courage to grow up and become who you really are.
data.author: E. E. Cummings

data.quote: Great minds have great purposes, others have wishes. Little minds are tamed and subdued by misfortune; but great minds rise above them.
data.author: Washington Irving

data.quote: The start is what stops most people.
data.author: Don Shula

data.quote: Happiness is not something you postpone for the future; it is something you desing for the present.
data.author: Jim Rohn

data.quote: There are people who are generic. They make generic responses and they expect generic answers. They live inside a box and they think people who don't fit into their box are weird. But I'll tell you what, generic people are the weird people. They are like genetically-manipulated plants growing inside a laboratory, like indistinguishable faces, like droids. Like ignorance.
data.author: C. JoyBell C.

data.quote: I think everybody's weird. We should all celebrate our individuality and not be embarrassed or ashamed of it.
data.author: Johnny Depp

data.quote: I never set out to be weird. It was always other people who called me weird.
data.author: Frank Zappa

data.quote: That proves you are unusual," returned the Scarecrow; "and I am convinced that the only people worthy of consideration in this world are the unusual ones. For the common folks are like the leaves of a tree, and live and die unnoticed.
data.author: L. Frank Baum, The Land of Oz

data.quote: A girl’s got to use what she’s given and I’m not going to make a guy drool the way a Britney video does. So I take it to extremes. I don’t say I dress sexily on stage - what I do is so extreme. It’s meant to make guys think: ‘I don’t know if this is sexy or just weird.
data.author: Lady Gaga

data.quote: We all know interspecies romance is weird.
data.author: Tim Burton

data.quote: All forms of madness, bizarre habits, awkwardness in society, general clumsiness, are justified in the person who creates good art.
data.author: Roman Payne, Rooftop Soliloquy

data.quote: Ph'nglui mglw'nafh Cthulhu R'lyeh wgah'nagl fhtagn In his house at R'lyeh dead Cthulhu waits dreaming.
data.author: H.P. Lovecraft, The Call of Cthulhu

data.quote: So you're a little weird? Work it! A little different? OWN it! Better to be a nerd than one of the herd!
data.author: Mandy Hale
